00022 class SADebug {
00026         protected static $displayFor = array('127.0.0.1');
00027         
00032         public static function acceptClient($ip) {
00033                 self::$displayFor[] = $ip;
00034         }
00035         
00044         public static function trace($message, $file = __FILE__, $line = __LINE__, $method = __METHOD__) {
00045                 SALog::log("$file on line $line - $method: $message", SA_LOG_ERROR);
00046                 if (!(in_array($_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'], self::$displayFor))) return;
00047                 print "<div style='padding:2px; background-color:lightyellow; border:1px dashed red;'>$file on line $line<br><strong>{$method}</strong>: <span style='color:red'>{$message}</span></div>";
00048         }       
00049 }
